author: Andrew Ackerman
title: Treasury Meets With Banks, Trading Firms As It Weighs Releasing More Market Data
text:
U.S. policy makers are meeting with banks and trading firms about whether to release to the public data on the $14 trillion U.S. Treasury market that the government has been collecting since last summer.
“We are having thoughtful discussions with a wide range of market participants,” a Treasury spokeswoman said Monday.
